name: LitMan HUD
description:
[b]Thank You and Goodbye![/b]

It was a pleasurable experience. I loved what I were doing and remember everyone who was together. There was a good days and a bad ones. Together we shared the passion to this game. But everything has its own end. My modding is not the exception.

I want to say big Thank You to all of those who supported me all the way.

[b]This is latest planned update.[/b] I may resume updating my Mods in the future but no promisses. Also publishing source files to Gitlab is planned.

[quote]Days I'm Modding Conan Exiles: 932 days or 2 years, 6 months, 18 days

Mods Released: 19
Mods Updates: 837
Followers: 382
Total Unique Visitors: 371154
Current Subscribers: 231707
Total Unique Subscribers: 322244
Current Favorites: 8817
Total Unique Favorites: 10501
Positive Ratings: 2752
Negative ratings: 70[/quote]

Simple HUD. Made to get some information on Screen.

Top Left:
Current Weight,
Max Weight,
Temperature.

Bottom left:
Current XP,
XP remaining till nex level,
Current Level (big number).

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/UywFkmp

If you liked my Mods feel free to Donate on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis.

Mod ID: 1164444907
